inclusion.criterion: having a neurogenic bladder with automatic catheter and pharmacologic disconnection of the detrusor muscle
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: having at least 4 symptomatic UTIs per year with bacterial sensitivity to the chosen antibiotics
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: having given full consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: being the recipient of social security benefits
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known allergy or hypersensitivity to useful antibiotics (to which the bacterium or bacteria are sensitive) or to one of their components
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: other contraindication in the administering of useful antibiotics
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: urinary volume flow >500 ml during automatic catheter
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: different urinary drainage method than automatic catheter
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: occurrence of stones in the urinary tract
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: infection due to endo urinary material (urinary prosthesis, ureteral stent)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and multiple prior admissions for UTIs. They have been treated with vanc/meropenem and are currently on ditropan changed over to detrol.
